author: Ubisoft
description:
Go behind the scenes of “Valley of Memory,” a free new story arc for Assassin’s Creed Mirage set in the stunning region of AlUla.
This expansion deepens Basim’s journey and brings players into a world shaped by millennia of history.
To ensure authenticity and depth in recreating this iconic setting, we partnered with leading experts from the Royal Commission for AlUla:
🎙️ Dr. Abdulrahman AlSuhaibani, Vice President for Culture
🎙️ Dr. Rebecca Foote, Director of Archaeology & Cultural Heritage Research
Their insights into AlUla’s archaeological significance and cultural legacy helped shape the immersive experience players will explore—from the ancient necropolises of Hegra to the vibrant oasis towns along the Incense Road.
Discover how history, gameplay, and storytelling converge in this exciting new chapter—available November 18.

About Assassin's Creed Mirage:
In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Building Valley of Memory

title: Jian Jun is free for a limited time !

author: Ubisoft
description:
Jiang Jun is free for a limited time, and on sale as well! We're also releasing a Unique Execution for that Hero.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor 

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - October 9

title: The demo for Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era is now live!

author: Ubisoft
description:
Command 4 factions, battle across 3 templates, and try 3 game modes. Play the demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3241970/Heroes_of_Might_and_Magic_Olden_Era_Demo/

"Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era is the new installment in the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games.

Olden Era returns to the world of Enroth and the origins of the legendary saga, inviting both veterans and new players to go on a new strategic quest on Jadame, a mysterious continent in turmoil, mentioned but never explored in the previous games, with its unique factions, biomes and creatures.

Traverse a vibrant and living fantasy world full of wonders and dangers, build magnificent castles, raise massive armies and clash in epic and highly tactical battles of heroes and mythical creatures.

Play solo with a new campaign, explore single and limitless randomly generated maps, or engage in battle of wits and magic with other players in multiplayer mode. Or even build your o
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era - Demo Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
Play for free from October 9th to October 13th, on PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Ubisoft Connect. The best part? You get to keep your progression if you decide to purchase the game, now 75% off! Try out the new Dirt Bikes, improved Park Creator, Mass Races XL, and much more. 
Ride now: https://ridersrepublic.com/fwe_oct2025 

About Riders Republic:
Live out the rider's fantasy as you roam free in a huge, vibrant open world, always buzzing with other players around you. Immerse yourself in iconic American national parks including Bryce Canyon, Yosemite Valley, Mammoth Mountain... all mashed up for you to shred! Squad up with your friends and compete in a wide range of multiplayer modes: feel the rush of downhill races, dominate maps in team vs team competitions, or give it your best shot in epic mass PvP races with 50+ other players.

#Ubisoft #ridersrepublic 

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the
